description: Many of us who frequent farmers’ markets this time of year bring home far more figs than we need This thick, date-sweetened smoothie is a great way to get rid of the extras.
title: Fresh Fig and Date Shake
title_page: Fresh Fig and Date Shake Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Many of us who frequent farmers’ markets this time of year bring home far more figs than we need. This thick, date-sweetened smoothie is a great way to get rid of the extras.
Featured in: Fruit Smoothies For Summer.
